mapper.insert: INSERT INTO corona_info.corona_info (accExamCnt, accExamCompCnt, careCnt, clearCnt, deathCnt, decideCnt, examCnt, resultNegCnt, stateTime) VALUES (#{accExamCnt}, #{accExamCompCnt}, #{careCnt}, #{clearCnt}, #{deathCnt}, #{decideCnt}, #{examCnt}, #{resultNegCnt}, #{stateTime});
mapper.select: select * from corona_info where stateTime >= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sido_info (createDt, deathCnt, defCnt, gubun, incDec, isolClearCnt, isolIngCnt, localOccCnt, overFlowCnt) VALUES (#{createDt}, #{deathCnt}, #{defCnt}, #{gubun}, #{incDec}, #{isolClearCnt}, #{isolIngCnt}, #{localOccCnt}, #{overFlowCnt});
mapper.select: select * from sido_info where createDt >= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") and gubun != '합계'
